Description: The SHCS Local Authority tables either supplement our Key Findings report or are based on specific requests received from Local Authorities for their own use.
Name: Scottish House Condition Survey
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by clicking on the  2015 - 2017 link under Scottish House Condition Survey - Local Authority Analyses, previous years are available under this link if required.  The link will take you to another page  titled  'SHCS Local Authority Analysis 2015-2017' that data is located in the second file box.
Sizing Notes: Most tabs simple structure but with subdimensions. One tab includes multiple table. One footnote in introduction appears in multiple tabs.
